lead_paragraph: The rights group had planned to present a report in Bangkok accusing the ruling junta, but the police said the group’s employees would breach Thai labor law.

headline.print_headline: Under Pressure, Amnesty International Cancels Briefing on Torture in Thailand
headline.main: Under Pressure, Amnesty International Cancels Briefing on Torture in Thailand

snippet: The rights group had planned to present a report in Bangkok accusing the ruling junta, but the police said the group’s employees would breach Thai labor law....
abstract: Thai officials prevent Amnesty International from publicly presenting report that alleges country's ruling military junta is guilty of torture and abuse; press briefing is cancelled at last minute by Amnesty International staff after police officers warn public session would be in violation of Thai labor law.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
